entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:45 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 11.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 3:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 11.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: 8.7°C
Wind: SSW 20 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
